title: Admin-Dashboard
description: a highly interactive and responsive Admin Dashboard using React and Material UI, aimed at improving user management, data analytics, and content management systems. This project features real-time data visualization, user management, and performance optimization for seamless scalability and responsiveness across devices.

title: Currency Convertor
description: A dynamic currency converter using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Material-UI. The app fetches real-time exchange rates, ensuring accurate conversions. With a responsive design. This project showcases my skills in modern web development and commitment to creating practical, user-friendly applications.

title: E-Commerce Shopping Cart
description: E-commerce shopping page using HTML,CSS,JavaScript where user can choose any item and put the item in cart.User can also use coupon codes during the time of checkout

title: To-Do List application
description: a responsive to-do list application using ReactJS, HTML, and CSS allowing users to efficiently manage tasks with an intuitive and user-friendly interface.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Dynamic Weather Forecast App created using React JS, Tailwind CSS, Material UI which Forecasts the temperature, humidity, air pressure, climate for the city entered by User

title: Map Your Location
description: Dynamic Location Mapping App using HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Allows users to manage geographical data. Implemented markers and used CRUD operations on location entries.

title: Web-based Dice game
description: interactive web-based dice game using HTML, CSS, JavaScript offering a dynamic and engaging gaming experience. Implemented user-friendly interface allowing seamless interaction.

title: Stock Market Prediction-Analyisis
description: Made with help of ANN and Keras predicting the future of a stock by analyzing past history.It also has a matplotlib to display graphical returns

title: Speech recognition App
description: A Speech recognition python app made with TensorFlow and Keras analyzing different voices. It also has a matplotlib to display voice frequency in graphical format.
